root.name: Ultimate Mortal Kombat
root.description: OverviewUltimate Mortal Kombat is a port of Ultimate Mortal Kombat 3 and it also contains a puzzle game that was included in Mortal Kombat: Deception. The game was released on June 27th, 2007.Ultimate Mortal Kombat 3Ultimate Mortal Kombat 3 is a upgraded version of the original game, Mortal Kombat 3. Ultimate Mortal Kombat 3 contains two more characters such as: Scorpion, and classic Sub-Zero. It also added more moves to some of the existing cast, like Stryker. As a added bonus to the DS version, the game also contains online play.CharactersScorpionSub-ZeroKurtis StrykerReptileCyraxLiu Kang Jax BriggsNightWolfSektorShang Tsung SheevaSindelSmokeSonya BladeMileena Classic Sub-ZeroErmacHuman SmokeKabalMotaroShao KahnPuzzle KombatPuzzle Kombat is a game that was included in Mortal Kombat: Deception. The game plays a lot similar to Capcom's Super Puzzle Fighter II: Turbo.Characters ScorpionBarakaNightwolfErmacSindelSub-ZeroBo' Rai ChoKenshiMileenaJadeKabalRaiden
